The Department and the College of Science and Engineering at WWU invites applications for a tenure track position that
involves developing and teaching lab-based electrical and computer engineering courses, 
conducting research, advising students, engaging with the community, and service to support 
the electrical and computer engineering department and the university. 
This position offers a unique and exciting opportunity to be part of the growth of the department, 
including the development of new curricula, research areas, and laboratory facilities.
